title: Disaster Response Logistics Game-Based Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary logistics management and disaster classification knowledge
context.additional_context: A process where learners with practical experience perform collaborative simulations in smartphone environments to strengthen logistics decision-making capabilities during disasters

learning_goals: Logistics resource allocation strategies can be explained according to various disaster types (earthquakes, floods, storms, fires, etc.)
Optimal logistics routes can be designed through stakeholder collaboration under limited resource and time constraints
Decision-making reflecting minimization of casualties and resource optimization in simulation environments can be evaluated in connection with real-world cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
